name: The Puzzsoft Museum Of Time And Space
name_original: The Puzzsoft Museum Of Time And Space
description:
Welcome To The Puzzsoft Museum Of Time And Space! 

This building is dedicated to showing off the unfinished, unreleased, and underappreciated software that Puzzsoft has made throughout the years.

This Museum Download Includes:

  • The Virtual Museum Itself, where you can wander around and learn interesting tidbits both true and fictional about the World Of Puzzsoft
  • Space, a long lost puzzsoft game about shooting stuff in space!
  • Time, a long lost puzzsoft game about aging and platforming!
  • Proximi3, a Triptych of games that have never before been released with proper context, until now!
  • "And More!"

You *could* play all those games on their own, OR you could download the museum and experience a multimedia Thinksplosion like you've never thinked before!

Some of the content of the Museum can be found in text form here. If you don't have a computer that can run the Museum I recommend playing Time and Space in browser and then reading this.

Credits:

  • Puzzsoft is JohnLee Cooper, Marty Daniels, Michael Guattery, and Rachel Theil
  • Arcade Machine Music by Osting
  • FPS controller by Ben Esposito
  • Clayxels is in there too
  • starbuck model by "Cordelle" on 3d warehouse
  • skeleton model by Lugia3D on the Unity Asset Store
